verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, When ye come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>; (this is the land <S%H776><s%> that shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto you for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, even the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%> with the coasts <S%H1367><s%> thereof:)

Then your south <S%H5045><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> shall be from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> along by the coast <S%H3027><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, and your south <S%H5045><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> shall be the outmost coast <S%H7097><s%> of the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> eastward <S%H6924><s%>:

And your border <S%H1366><s%> shall turn <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from the south <S%H5045><s%> to the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Akrabbim <S%H4610><s%>, and pass on <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Zin <S%H6790><s%>: and the going forth <S%H8444><s%> thereof shall be from the south <S%H5045><s%> to Kadeshbarnea <S%H6947><s%>, and shall go on <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Hazaraddar <S%H2692><s%>, and pass on <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Azmon <S%H6111><s%>:

And the border <S%H1366><s%> shall fetch a compass <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from Azmon <S%H6111><s%> unto the river <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of it shall be at the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

And as for the western <S%H3220><s%> border <S%H1366><s%>, ye shall even have the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> for a border <S%H1366><s%>: this shall be your west <S%H3220><s%> border <S%H1366><s%>.

And this shall be your north <S%H6828><s%> border <S%H1366><s%>: from the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> ye shall point out <S%H8376><s%> <S%H8762><s%> for you mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>:

From mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> ye shall point out <S%H8376><s%> <S%H8762><s%> your border unto the entrance <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of Hamath <S%H2574><s%>; and the goings forth <S%H8444><s%> of the border <S%H1366><s%> shall be to Zedad <S%H6657><s%>:

And the border <S%H1366><s%> shall go on <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Ziphron <S%H2202><s%>, and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of it shall be at Hazarenan <S%H2704><s%>: this shall be your north <S%H6828><s%> border <S%H1366><s%>.
And ye shall point out <S%H184><s%> <S%H8694><s%> your east <S%H6924><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> from Hazarenan <S%H2704><s%> to Shepham <S%H8221><s%>:

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> shall go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from Shepham <S%H8221><s%> to Riblah <S%H7247><s%>, on the east side <S%H6924><s%> of Ain <S%H5871><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> shall descend <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and shall reach <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the side <S%H3802><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%> eastward <S%H6924><s%>:

And the border <S%H1366><s%> shall go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of it shall be at the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>: this shall be your land <S%H776><s%> with the coasts <S%H1367><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, This is the land <S%H776><s%> which ye shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8691><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%>, and to the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%>:

For the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7206><s%> according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, and the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1425><s%> according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, have received <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their inheritance; and half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>:

The two <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> near Yericho <S%H3405><s%> eastward <S%H6924><s%>, toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> which shall divide <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> unto you: Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>.

And ye shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> one <S%H259><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of every tribe <S%H4294><s%>, to divide <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> by inheritance <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.
And the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> are these: Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, Kalev <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Y'funeh <S%H3312><s%>.
And of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>, Shemuel <S%H8050><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud <S%H5989><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, Elidad <S%H449><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Chislon <S%H3692><s%>.
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, Bukki <S%H1231><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jogli <S%H3020><s%>.

The prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, Hanniel <S%H2592><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ephod <S%H641><s%>.
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, Kemuel <S%H7055><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shiphtan <S%H8204><s%>.
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%>, Elizaphan <S%H469><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Parnach <S%H6535><s%>.
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%>, Paltiel <S%H6409><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azzan <S%H5821><s%>.
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, Ahihud <S%H282><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelomi <S%H8015><s%>.
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naftali <S%H5321><s%>, Pedahel <S%H6300><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud <S%H5989><s%>.

These are they whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to divide the inheritance <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>.
